characters.name: Dusty Pages
characters.description: The former head librarian of the Canterlot Library in The Point of No Return. Also appears in The Last Problem. Shares her body type with "Chelsea Porcelain", "Wilma", S04E08 Unnamed Earth Mare #5, "Soybean Sorbet", "Hearty Brew", and S09E05 Unnamed Earth Mare #3. Her cutie mark is a dusty book. Voiced by Ellen Kennedy.

characters.name: Goldie Delicious
characters.description: See Goldie Delicious.

characters.name: Grand Pear
characters.description: See Grand Pear.

characters.name: Granny Smith
characters.description: See Granny Smith.

characters.name: Ma Hooffield
characters.description: Appears in The Hooffields and McColts as the matriarch of the Hooffield family. Also appears in a photograph in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 3. Her cutie mark is a pumpkin. Voiced by Ellen Kennedy. She is a character in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name: The Olden Pony
characters.description: Told of by Rainbow Dash during Sleepless in Ponyville, and subsequently appears in two of Scootaloo's dreams, searching for her rusty horseshoe. Also appears in Ponyville Mysteries: Riddle of the Rusty Horseshoe. Voiced by Tabitha St. Germain. She is a character in Gameloft's mobile game, and serves as an enemy minion during the "Nightmare Night at the Museum" event.

characters.name: Randolph
characters.description: See Randolph.

characters.name: Rusty Tenure
characters.description: Appears in Rock Solid Friendship as a professor at the Equestrian Institute of Rockology. Shares his body type and eye color with Sand Trap, "Commander Redfeather", "Fetter Keys", S06E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8, "Peduncle Bloom", S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5, and S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3 and his body type with S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #20, Grand Pear, "Cortland", "Loose Tracks", and S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4. Voiced by Russell Roberts.

characters.name: Apple Rose
characters.description: See Apple Rose.

characters.name: Apple Strudel
characters.description: See Apple Strudel.

characters.name: Auntie Applesauce
characters.description: See Auntie Applesauce.

characters.name: Booksmart
characters.description: The librarian of the Canterlot library who attends Moon Dancer's party in Amending Fences. Also appears in The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1, Parental Glideance, Yakity-Sax, and in The Washouts. Shares her body type with Amethyst Maresbury and "Tough Nut", and resembles Inkwell. Her cutie mark is two books.

characters.name: Buzzard Hooffield
characters.description: Appears in The Hooffields and McColts as a member of the Hooffield family. Also appears in a photograph in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 3. His cutie mark switches from being a golf club and two golf balls, the same as that of Sand Trap, to being a fork. Voiced by Peter Kelamis.

characters.name: Chelsea Porcelain
characters.description: See Chelsea Porcelain.

characters.name: Commander Redfeather
characters.description: Appears with "Immemoria" in Equestria Games and Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1 and its recap at the beginning of Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2 and on the season 4 poster. Shares his design and mane and eye colors with Sand Trap, his design and eye color with S06E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8, his body type and eye color with "Fetter Keys", Rusty Tenure, "Peduncle Bloom", S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5, and S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3, and his body type with S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #20, Grand Pear, "Cortland", "Loose Tracks", and S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4.

characters.name:
Edler[sic] Stallion
Cortland
characters.description: Appears in Daring Done? as a resident of Somnambula. Also appears in Road to Friendship and The Point of No Return. Shares his body type with Sand Trap, "Commander Redfeather", "Fetter Keys", S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #20, S06E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8, Rusty Tenure, "Peduncle Bloom", Grand Pear, S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5, "Loose Tracks", S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3, and S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4. His cutie mark is an apple and flower. Voiced by Jay Brazeau. He is a character called "Somnambulan Storyteller" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name: Dusty McColt
characters.description: Appears in The Hooffields and McColts as a member of the McColt family. His cutie mark is a dust cloud.

characters.name:
Pest Control Pony
Egon
characters.description: Appears in Apple Bloom's first dream in Bloom & Gloom as a pest control pony. Voiced by Peter New. He is a playable character in Gameloft's mobile game, which gives him the description "With brave green eyes, he works long into the night. Only Pest Control Pony stands between Equestria... and the pesty parasprites!"

characters.name:
Senior Deputy
Fetter Keys
characters.description: See Appleloosa deputies.

characters.name: Foggy Fleece
characters.description: See Foggy Fleece.

characters.name: Mr. Greenhooves
characters.description: See Mr. Greenhooves.

characters.name: Groucho Mark
characters.description: Appears in The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows. Shares his coat and mane colors with Fluttershy. His cutie mark is a pair of Groucho glasses.

characters.name: Haymaker
characters.description: Appears in Rainbow Falls as Spitfire's masseur and trainer. He appears to be a pony version of Burgess Meredith's character Mickey Goldmill from the 1976 film Rocky. His cutie mark is a wrestling/boxing bell. He is named on his Enterplay collectible card game The Crystal Games expansion set card #48 R, which lists the quote "When I'm done with you, you're gonna eat lightning and you're gonna snort thunder!" In the game's High Magic expansion set, card #57 C of Elizabeak attributes to Haymaker the quote "If you can catch this thing, you can catch greased lightning!"

characters.name: Haymish
characters.description: A pink-maned elderly pony who appears during one shot in Too Many Pinkie Pies, wearing a shirt, vest, and hat. He does not have a beard, but a Pinkie Pie duplicate resembles one while wrapped around him. A similar pony appears on Micro-Series Issue #7 page 18. Shares his body type with Apple Strudel. His cutie mark is a pitchfork with hay.

characters.name: Hearty Brew
characters.description: Appears in Once Upon a Zeppelin as a passenger on Iron Will's Cruise of the Princesses Experience. Also appears in Between Dark and Dawn. Shares her design with "Chelsea Porcelain", "Wilma", "Soybean Sorbet", and S09E05 Unnamed Earth Mare #3 and her body type with S04E08 Unnamed Earth Mare #5 and Dusty Pages. Her cutie mark is a teacup.

characters.name: Immemoria
characters.description: Appears with "Commander Redfeather" in Equestria Games and Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1 and its recap at the beginning of Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2 and on the season 4 poster.

characters.name: Lemongrass
characters.description: Appears in A Royal Problem as one of three delegate ponies at Princess Luna's luncheon. Shares her body type with Granny Smith, Foggy Fleece, Pearly Stitch, S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #18, "Lotus Petal", elderly S04E20 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #3, and S09E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #1.

characters.name:
Unicorn Painter
Leonardo da Brinci
characters.description: Paints Spike's portrait in Princess Spike. Also appears in On Your Marks. His cutie mark depicts S05E10 Unnamed Earth Mare #0. He is a character called "Unicorn Painter" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name:
Ticket Taker Pony
Loose Tracks
characters.description: Appears in Sounds of Silence as a deranged ticket-selling pony at the Peaks of Peril train station. Also appears in Growing Up is Hard to Do. Shares his body type with Sand Trap, "Commander Redfeather", "Fetter Keys", S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #20, S06E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8, Rusty Tenure, "Peduncle Bloom", Grand Pear, "Cortland", S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5, S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3, and S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4. His cutie mark is two train tickets. Voiced by Ron Halder. He is a character called "Stationmaster Pony" in Gameloft's mobile game. "He’s very lonely" according to Jim Miller.

characters.name:
Old Gardener
Lotus Petal
characters.description: Appears in Shadow Play - Part 1 as a descendant of the villagers in Mistmane's old home. Shares her body type with Granny Smith, Foggy Fleece, Pearly Stitch, S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #18, "Lemongrass", S08E19 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1, elderly S04E20 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #3, and S09E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #1. Her cutie mark is a crystal rose. Voiced by Nicole Oliver. She is a character called "Mistmane Family Gardener" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name: Ma Switchell
characters.description: An elderly mare who appears in Somepony to Watch Over Me, in Fame and Misfortune, and on the season 4 poster. Mother to "Duce Switchell".

characters.name: Ol' Salt
characters.description: Resembles a stereotypical old, drunk, wild-west miner. Gets himself thrown out of The Salt Block by "Morton Saltworthy" in Over a Barrel. Also appears in Fame and Misfortune. His cutie mark is a pickaxe. Voiced by Ashleigh Ball. He is named on his Enterplay collectible card game card α #48 U, which gives him the description "With all the tall tales this pony spouts at the local watering hole, everything he says should be taken with a grain of salt."

characters.name: Pearly Stitch
characters.description: See Pearly Stitch.

characters.name: Peduncle Bloom
characters.description: Appears in A Royal Problem as a royal rose contest participant. Shares his body type and eye color with Sand Trap, "Commander Redfeather", "Fetter Keys", S06E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8, Rusty Tenure, S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5, and S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3 and his body type with S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #20, Grand Pear, "Cortland", "Loose Tracks", and S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4.

characters.name: Pipe Down
characters.description: Appears throughout crowds during A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2 and Magical Mystery Cure. Has the same design as Mr. Waddle. His cutie mark is a pipe and he wears glasses, though initially his cutie mark is three pipes and his glasses are absent. Two promotional images from The Hub's Facebook page show him more clearly than the corresponding frames of the show do. Character designer Rebecca Dart stated in an interview that she designed a bespectacled old male pony, and mentioned on Twitter that the pony in question was designed as "Incidental Senior Pony #3".

characters.name: Sand Trap
characters.description: See Sand Trap.

characters.name: Savage Honeydew
characters.description: A bearded elderly stallion who appears wearing glasses in Somepony to Watch Over Me. Also appears in Fame and Misfortune, A Rockhoof and a Hard Place, and Growing Up is Hard to Do.

characters.name: Soybean Sorbet
characters.description: Appears in Forever Filly as the formerly retired owner of a Ponyville ice cream shop. Also appears in Once Upon a Zeppelin. Shares her design and eye color with "Chelsea Porcelain", her design with "Wilma", "Hearty Brew", and S09E05 Unnamed Earth Mare #3 and her body type with S04E08 Unnamed Earth Mare #5 and Dusty Pages. Her cutie mark is a swirled ice cream cone.

characters.name: Mr. Waddle
characters.description: See Mr. Waddle.

characters.name: Wilma
characters.description: Appears throughout crowds during A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2 and Magical Mystery Cure. Has the same design as "Chelsea Porcelain", "Soybean Sorbet", "Hearty Brew", and S09E05 Unnamed Earth Mare #3 and the same body type as S04E08 Unnamed Earth Mare #5 and Dusty Pages. Two promotional images from The Hub's Facebook page show her more clearly than the corresponding frames of the show do.

characters.name:
Librarian
Amethyst Maresbury
characters.description: See Amethyst Maresbury.

characters.name:
Stubborn Crystal Pony
Tough Nut
characters.description: Appears in The Crystalling - Part 2 as a witness to Flurry Heart's Crystalling. Also appears in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 9. Shares her body type with Amethyst Maresbury and "Booksmart". Her cutie mark is a mule. Voiced by Andrea Libman. She is a character called "Stubborn Crystal Pony" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name: Snails
characters.description: See Snails.

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #3
characters.description: See S04E20 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #3.

characters.name: S04E08 Unnamed Earth Mare #5
characters.description: An elderly mare who appears in Rarity Takes Manehattan, Made in Manehattan, The Perfect Pear, Fame and Misfortune, Grannies Gone Wild, and The Point of No Return. In Made in Manehattan, she yells "Hey, I'm trotting here!" to cabbie "Caboose" after he almost hits her. In The Perfect Pear, she appears as a young mare in multiple flashbacks. Shares her body type with "Chelsea Porcelain", "Wilma", "Soybean Sorbet", "Hearty Brew", Dusty Pages, and S09E05 Unnamed Earth Mare #3.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #18
characters.description: Appears as a rodeo school judge in Trouble Shoes' flashback and in the present in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Also appears in Growing Up is Hard to Do. Shares her body type and eye color with Pearly Stitch and S09E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #1, her body type and sometimes eye color with Foggy Fleece, and her body type with Granny Smith, "Lemongrass", "Lotus Petal", S08E19 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1, and elderly S04E20 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #3.

characters.name: S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #20
characters.description: Appears as a rodeo school judge in Trouble Shoes' flashback and in the present in Appleoosa's Most Wanted. Also appears in Growing Up is Hard to Do. Shares his body type with Sand Trap, "Commander Redfeather", "Fetter Keys", S06E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8, Rusty Tenure, "Peduncle Bloom", Grand Pear, "Cortland", S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5, "Loose Tracks", S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3, and S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4.

characters.name: S05E17 Unnamed Earth Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in Brotherhooves Social as one of the Sisterhooves Social judges. Her cutie mark is three doilies.

characters.name: S05E17 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Brotherhooves Social as one of the Sisterhooves Social judges. His cutie mark is a bolo tie.

characters.name: S06E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8
characters.description: Appears in A Hearth's Warming Tail receiving a sweater from the Spirit of Hearth's Warming Presents. Shares his design and eye color with Sand Trap and "Commander Redfeather", his body type and eye color with "Fetter Keys", Rusty Tenure, "Peduncle Bloom", S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5, and S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3, and his body type with S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #20, Grand Pear, "Cortland", "Loose Tracks", and S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4. His cutie mark is flan.

characters.name: S07E18 Unnamed Earth Mare #4
characters.description: Appears in Daring Done? as a poor villager in Somnambula's legend.

characters.name: S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears in flashback in Shadow Play - Part 2 during the Sirens' attack on a village in the Hollow Shades. Shares his body type and eye color with Sand Trap, "Commander Redfeather", "Fetter Keys", S06E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8, "Peduncle Bloom", and S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3 and his body type with S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #20, Rusty Tenure, Grand Pear, S07E18 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2, "Loose Tracks", and S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4.

characters.name:
Short Pony
S08E19 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Road to Friendship as an innkeeper in Somnambula. Shares his body type and eye color with Granny Smith and his body type with Foggy Fleece, Pearly Stitch, S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #18, "Lemongrass", "Lotus Petal", elderly S04E20 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #3, and S09E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #1. He is a character named "Elderly Innkeeper" in Gameloft's mobile game. His bio states, "This Somnambulan has seen many Glowpaz Festivals come and go...and many potential patrons get priced out of his luxurious junior suite." Voiced by Tariq Leslie.

characters.name: S09E05 Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in The Point of No Return as a resident of the Silver Stable Retirement Community. Shares her design with Goldie Delicious. Her cutie mark is three cupcakes.

characters.name: S09E05 Unnamed Earth Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in The Point of No Return as a resident of the Silver Stable Retirement Community. Shares her design with Auntie Applesauce. Her cutie mark is a pie.

characters.name: S09E05 Unnamed Earth Mare #3
characters.description: Appears in The Point of No Return as a resident of the Silver Stable Retirement Community. Shares her design with "Chelsea Porcelain", "Wilma", "Soybean Sorbet", and "Hearty Brew" and her body type with S04E08 Unnamed Earth Mare #5 and Dusty Pages.

characters.name:
Old Stallion
S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in The Point of No Return as a resident of the Silver Stable Retirement Community. Shares his body type with Sand Trap, "Commander Redfeather", "Fetter Keys", S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #20, S06E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8, Rusty Tenure, "Peduncle Bloom", Grand Pear, "Cortland", S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5, "Loose Tracks", and S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4. His cutie mark is a sailboat. Voiced by Paul Dobson. Pictured for Gillian M. Berrow's April 27, 2019 "Fun Ep. 905 fact: Silver Stables was inspired by my husband JM's grandpa, Bob. He lives in a retirement community in New Hampshire and is always busy-- especially with woodworking and art! Very impressive."

characters.name: S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in The Point of No Return as a resident of the Silver Stable Retirement Community. Shares his design with Grand Pear and his body type with Sand Trap, "Commander Redfeather", "Fetter Keys", S05E06 Unnamed Earth Stallion #20, S06E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8, Rusty Tenure, "Peduncle Bloom", "Cortland", S07E26 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5, "Loose Tracks", and S09E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #3. His cutie mark is four green candies.

characters.name: S09E22 Unnamed Earth Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Growing Up is Hard to Do during Being Big is All It Takes. Shares her body type with Granny Smith, Foggy Fleece, Pearly Stitch, S05E06 Unnamed Earth Mare #18, "Lotus Petal", "Lemongrass", S08E19 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #1, and elderly S04E20 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #3.
